entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
